mainText:
Promo: Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your riches are as limitless as your self-importance!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into the Bank of Entitlement with my tailored suit and designer sunglasses, ready to make a deposit that would make even the Wall Street elite jealous. As I approached the teller, I could practically hear the envy oozing from the other customers. I handed over my check, a sum so substantial it could probably solve world hunger (if I didn't have more important things to spend it on, of course). But as the teller started processing it, I noticed a slight frown on her face. "Sir," she said hesitantly, "This...this is too much money for a single deposit. Our limit is--"I cut her off with a dismissive wave of my hand. "Limits are for the little people," I declared, my voice dripping with entitlement. "I demand that you make an exception for me, the illustrious Hot Josh, CEO extraordinaire."The teller blinked in surprise, clearly taken aback by my audacity. But after a moment of hesitation, she nodded and continued the transaction. As I sauntered out of the bank, my ego inflated to the size of a hot air balloon, I couldn't help but revel in my own magnificence. Who needs limits when you're as entitled as I am?
